=Linkedin=
_step by step guide for obtaining consumer key, consumer secret, callback and cancel urls._

==Steps==

*1. Go to url : [https://www.linkedin.com/] and create your account.*

https://socialauth-android.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/linkedinlogin.png

*2. Go to url : [http://developer.linkedin.com/] and press Sign In.*

https://socialauth-android.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/linkedindeveloper.png

*3. Fill app Info as shown.* 

https://socialauth-android.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/linkedinappinfo.png

*4. fill CallBack Url. Please note this URL will be used as your app callback url. the Integration url will be used as your cancel url.*




https://socialauth-android.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/linkedinoauth.png
